reason: Recent overdose indicates a high risk of future attempts. Seeking support is a positive sign, but the underlying risk remains very high.

title: User Story: Abuse
content: "Things have been rough lately. Constant yelling, then the silent treatment. Walking on eggshells is exhausting. Anyone else deal with this? Feeling so alone."
reason: The text describes a stressful and potentially emotionally abusive environment (constant yelling, silent treatment, walking on eggshells). While not explicitly mentioning physical violence or self-harm, the feeling of isolation and distress raises concern.

title: User Story: Overdose
content: Saw someone OD downtown yesterday. Scary stuff. Please, if you're struggling, reach out. There are people who care and want to help. Don't become a statistic.
reason: The text describes an overdose, indicating a potential safety risk, and implicitly warns against similar outcomes. While not directly expressing intent, it acknowledges the possibility of further incidents.

title: User Story: Violence
content: Just saw a guy punch his car after getting a ticket. Made me jump. Reminded me too much of my dad. Anyone else get triggered by stuff like that? Feel so on edge now.
reason: The text describes witnessing an outburst of anger that triggered a negative emotional response in the author. While the author is feeling on edge, there is no indication of intent to harm themselves or others. The author is describing their emotional reaction rather than taking any action.

title: User Story: Overdose
content: Just found out a friend OD'd. Scared & heartbroken. This stuff is so dangerous. Please, if you're struggling, reach out. There are people who care.
reason: While the text expresses grief and loss due to a friend's overdose, it also acknowledges the danger and encourages seeking help. This indicates awareness and potential support-seeking behavior for the author, mitigating immediate risk but highlighting a vulnerability to the same dangers that caused the friend's overdose.

title: User Story: Suicide
content:
**Option 1 (Seeking Help):**

**Option 2 (Personal Story - Brief):**
